column3: Traffic; Kampong Speu Province: At 5:50 pm on January 23
column8: a Camry 2K.8067  hit two motorbikes and slammed into a house.------The moto riders escaped unhurt
column9: but the 60-year-old woman who owned the house was slightly injured and sent to hospital.------After crashing the unidentified car driver ran off and has yet to be traced.------The vehicles involved have been sent to the Samrong District Police Inspectorate for the case to be investigated. ------SOURCE
